Name: Havoc in heaven
About the game: 'Havoc in heaven' is a defense strategy game with the theme of the novel Journey to the west. The classic storyline and variety of characters in the journey to the West show an alternative style of game to experience the most unique and novel VR tower defense game. 'Naotiangong' character design cute and funny, cool special effects. Pick up your bow and beat the monster army of Dasheng with me. The game is not only realistic and interesting, but also can exercise your muscles. More interesting play and fairy sister waiting for your call! More fun is about to be opened!
Developers: BeiJing Da Xing Media Limited Company
Publishers: BeiJing Da Xing Media Limited Company
